```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# comment this out to print code
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)
FIG_NB <- 0
FIG_STRING <- "Supplementary Figure S"
getFigNb <- function(increment=FALSE){
  if(increment) FIG_NB <<- FIG_NB + 1
  paste0(FIG_STRING,FIG_NB)
}
```
